answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!The symptoms blood from nose can be due to a foreign body, nasal polyps, bleeding hemangiomas (localized collection of blood vessels), habit of picking at the nose, a tumor or inflammation due to say a nose ring.If there is a cough also then there is a chance of infection and sinusitis too. Rarely only nasal bleed can be due to a brain problem like a tumor.Please consult an ENT specialist. It is difficult to comment beyond this without examining. Take care!

question: My mam has diabetes, angina, and arthritis she recently got a swelling in her neck which runs into a lump at back of her neck and ear area she has passed blood clots through her nose she went to the doctor and he gave her steroids for her arthritis which i think has nothing to do with this lump or bleeding she has also had a few minor strokes she has to go for an x ray but i dont see how a doctor can blame this on arthritis its a joke can u advise please
title: lump at back of ear
